title: Zum Eichenkrug
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Fusion, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Traditional German village restaurant associated with a hotel in Mellendorf. Has a menu section dedicated to vegetarian and vegan dishes such as seitan geschnetzeltes (typical German dish), coconut curry, and tofu schnitzel. Hosts meetings of vegetarians and vegans who live in the area. Has a bowling alley for group rental.
